## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install crossword_generator in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure crossword_generator package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to crossword_generator
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/netzzwergeGithub/crossword-generator):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/netzzwergeGithub/crossword-generator.git
```

or from
[conda](https://anaconda.org/netzzwergeGithub/crossword-generator)

``` sh
$ conda install -c netzzwergeGithub crossword_generator
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/crossword-generator/)

``` sh
$ pip install crossword_generator
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/netzzwergeGithub/crossword-generator)’s
[pages](https://netzzwergeGithub.github.io/crossword-generator/).
Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/netzzwergeGithub/crossword-generator) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/crossword-generator/) respectively.
